text: I want to register VCF.jl that obviously does not meet the auto-merge guidelines. If you have comments on the package name, I'd like your input here or at <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/30036>

elements.text: I want to register VCF.jl that obviously does not meet the auto-merge guidelines. If you have comments on the package name, I'd like your input here or at

text: I would favor VariantCallFormat.jl, just because VCF is too short, and could easily clash with others. Also, I would guess most people using VCF files would know what it stood for.
